analyze.help_message:
I18n Translation Analyzer

Usage: node i18ntk-analyze.js [options]

Options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./src)
  --i18n-dir <dir>       I18n directory (default: ./src/locales)
  --output-report        Generate detailed report
  --output-dir <dir>     Output directory for reports (default: ./reports)
  --help                 Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-analyze.js --output-report
  node i18ntk-analyze.js --source-dir=./app --i18n-dir=./locales
  node i18ntk-analyze.js --output-dir=./analysis --output-report
